snippet.title: Souldiers: Official Nintendo Switch + PC Release Window Trailer
snippet.description:
Enjoy the latest trailer for Souldiers, a 16-bit-style pixel-art Metroidvania from developer Retro Forge Games that features Soulslike combat and challenging platforming gameplay. You can play as either a Scout, Caster, or Archer class. It's coming to Nintendo Switch and PC in Spring 2022.

#IGN #Gaming
